entry.title: Catalogue
entry.summary: This catalogue was created to expose and publicise the range of aesthetic action to which it can access the client, which ranges from Suites for relevant historical events, dramatisation, documentaries, and sublimation of stories/authors: Inspirational suites, Suites for interviews to contemporary creators and artists, Documentary…
entry.content:
This catalogue was created to expose and publicise the range of aesthetic action to which it can access the client, which ranges from Suites for relevant historical events, dramatisation, documentaries, and sublimation of stories/authors: Inspirational suites, Suites for interviews to contemporary creators and artists, Documentary suites, Suites for athletes, Suites for philosophical and literary discourse; to the creation of Suites for works of art individuals and specialised galleries.

  • Art Film para Artistas Contemporaneos Emergentes
  • Art Film para companias y documentalistas sobre arte. 
  • Art Film para Museos y Galerias
  • Art Film para Autores Modernos
  • Art Film para Historia y Arqueologia del Arte

entry.title: The Production Protocol
entry.summary: Consultation After a study of your email or first communication, we’ll arrange a call or meeting to discuss what you desire to achieve with your video, also creative ideas about content, tone, structure, and style. We will prepare a detailed proposal that works within your…
entry.content:
Consultation

After a study of your email or first communication, we’ll arrange a call or meeting to discuss what you desire to achieve with your video, also creative ideas about content, tone, structure, and style. We will prepare a detailed proposal that works within your budget. 

Pre-production

Once the proposal has been signed off between the Studio and the Artist with an agreement form, we’ll assign a dedicated Account Manager Expert who will be your constant monitor throughout the entire process, overseeing the whole project. Depending on the complexity of your project, our team will prepare an specific delivery schedule.

Production

The production materialises at our in-house studio for music and sound editing and specialist motion graphics design. During the production course, you will receive completed compositions via an online link, where you can offer your recommendation directly onto the video for quick and easy communication. Once signed off, you will get the final cut, delivered via secured online transfer.

Storage

We archive all of our projects and footage using a data storage system that will safely store footage for 15 years.

entry.title: Services
entry.summary: Our compositions exist, to enhance the levels of concentration of the public or audience, as well as the setting in perspective of the work or speech, raising the degree of attention on the time of the exposition In its first stage, the Studio delivers a…
entry.content:
Our compositions exist, to enhance the levels of concentration of the public or audience, as well as the setting in perspective of the work or speech, raising the degree of attention on the time of the exposition

In its first stage, the Studio delivers a product audiovisual or only audio, fully finished with a duration that can range from one (1:00) minute or fives minutes (5:00), attached with the score in digital format of the work, property of the client, subject to copyright and free exhibition for the D P Studio.

Digital Performances Studio has a clear emphasis on the creative possibilities of multi-instrumental sound design, specialising in:

  • Symphonic sound
  • Industrial sound
  • Atmospheric
  • Meditative
  • Rock
  • World music
  • Street music
  • and experimental range sound.

entry.title: Art House Prestige Film
entry.summary: Since our work belongs to small but strong niche-market audiences, we adopt an artistic framework of film analysis, a step above the common our team is responsible for creating the type of art film that will make the audience think. As a distinct model of…
entry.content:
Since our work belongs to small but strong niche-market audiences, we adopt an artistic framework of film analysis, a step above the common our team is responsible for creating the type of art film that will make the audience think.

As a distinct model of narration, we take care to challenge the audience and demand their full attention for a couple of significant minutes.

 

“Within the art cinema's mode of production and reception, the concept of the author has a formal function”
Bordwell

entry.title: About Us / Who We Are
entry.summary: Since 2020, Digital Performances Studio. Aesthetics Editions. We are a vanguard group specialised in creating an original and exclusive bespoke cinematographic cut & symphonic/instrumental score composition service for galleries, artists, emerging artists, TV, Documentary Films Companies, and the fine arts market. Digital Performances Studio develops…
entry.content:
Since 2020, Digital Performances Studio. Aesthetics Editions.

We are a vanguard group specialised in creating an original and exclusive bespoke cinematographic cut & symphonic/instrumental score composition service for galleries, artists, emerging artists, TV, Documentary Films Companies, and the fine arts market.

Digital Performances Studio develops a wide range of Digital Aura amplifications under a unique perspective of music composers, anthropologists, historians, filmmakers, and digital artists to lead the audience through a specific, intellectual, and powerfully emotional journey of cultural meanings detailed for each author.

In times of immediacy, paying attention is a form of aesthetic experience.

Our Studio is the only one that creates, at the same time, a photo genesis time of exhibition value from the inside out for each work, with a highly aesthetic specialised network of programming and digital configurations.

The Studio works as a creative producer to define and represent the artist's Digital Aura genesis in a cinematic art clip for galleries and the artist's portfolio.

Our essential basis is to create subjective realism and authorial presence in a few seconds, enhancing the objective realism (Digital Aura) with the authorial commentary. We assume the music composition art function as a cinematic narrator, where the artwork elements "tell themselves" to achieve a particular number of desired effects.

Your promotional film deserves to be a unique cinematic art experience.

When we produce content for artists' exhibitions, our goal is to assist the curators and exhibition designers through the narrative dimension of the art exhibition as effectively as possible.
